Text:
Hi blackcanary,

many thanx for the Transformers movie based issues that u uploaded few days ago , 
but from wiki i came to know there are few more issues which needs to be uploaded to complete the series. 

Here they are ,
* Transformers - Saga of the Allspark
* Transformers - Tales of the Fallen
* Transformers - Nefarious
* Transformers - Sector 7
* Transformers - Foundation
* Transformers - Riding Storm
* Convergence (Short Story)
* Transformers (Short Story)

Would be really great to have these missing ones :) Thanx bro
